title: Home Wrecker From Hell
itunes:title: Home Wrecker From Hell
description:
I really need your help. I'm a married mother of three. My husband and I have been together for almost 20 years. Everything is fine except the fact that my husband recently had an affair he confessed and totally regrets what he has done. However the low life homewrecker won't leave him alone. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
